Uses of Package
NationMania.core

  • Packages that use NationMania.core 
    Package Description
    NationMania.core
    NationMania.core is incharge of gameplay and back-end of UI.
    NationMania.db
    NationMania.db is incharge of communicating with the DB, connecting and executing queries
    NationMania.ui
    NationMania.ui is incharge of drawing User Interface and Handling user input.
  • Classes in NationMania.core used by NationMania.core 
    Class and Description
    Fact
    This is a data structure that holds relevant information for the game about all the facts of the current and next randomized state.
    It contains a unique ID, weight parameter to determine it's difficulty, and name, type and relation,
    which combined together builds the fact string.
    SortedFacts
    Class for dividing nation facts to buckets based on fact weight for better randomization
    Each bin contains a different range of difficulties.
    The bins are ordered from the hardest facts to the easiest
    The randomization of every fact is divided to 2 steps:
    1.
    SortedFacts.List 
    State
    Class that holds basic information for every state.
    If the State has been randomized during a game, it contains all it's related facts from the DB, ordered and divided to buckets
  • Classes in NationMania.core used by NationMania.db 
    Class and Description
    State
    Class that holds basic information for every state.
    If the State has been randomized during a game, it contains all it's related facts from the DB, ordered and divided to buckets
  • Classes in NationMania.core used by NationMania.ui 
    Class and Description
    Fact
    This is a data structure that holds relevant information for the game about all the facts of the current and next randomized state.
    It contains a unique ID, weight parameter to determine it's difficulty, and name, type and relation,
    which combined together builds the fact string.
